body.name: Toddler Travel Suitcase Seat with Safety Anti-Slip Rope,Ride on Suitcase for Kids,Ride Safer Travel Vest for Babies (Pink)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 21 hrs 22 mins
features: 🛫【Ride on Suitcase for Kids】-Do you worry about your baby's walking ability during travel? With this baby portable seat, you no longer need to purchase a specific baby stroller or suitcase. Just take it out of the storage bag and install it on your kids suitcase. Then your baby could safely and happily sit on the seat with the safety belt, freeing up your hands and making it easier for your family to enjoy the fun of the vacation.

🛫【Application of This Portable Travel Seat】-Suitable for babies aged 1-2 (9-24 months), the load-bearing capacity is Load bearing 44LB. Applicable for suitcase with Telescopic Rod Lengths Longer than 18 Inches. Please measure the length of your suitcase rod and your baby's height and weight before buying.

🚅【Convenient Parent Helper】-A perfect tool for taking your baby on a trip, suitable for car travel, railway travel, airplane travel, etc., making it easy to carry your baby to many places. It can be used in many types of luggage compartments, making your vacation travel easier.
🚅【Safety Anti-Slip Rope】-Each product comes with a free anti slip strap that can secure the luggage lever to the wrist, which can prevent the baby from falling down of the suitcase due to accidents.
🚢【Fast Installation】-There are installation sleeves on the back of the product. Install it on the luggage compartment lever and then you could use it, takes less than a minute to finish installation.

🙂【100% Quality Service】- If you find a defect in the product upon receiving it, please contact us, we will provide you with a full refund. And If you have any questions before or after purchase, we will also reply to you within 12 hours.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hard to work with
reviews.reviewText: This item is hard to work with and not very safe at all I thought it would be easier for my son to sit in but it's not only flimsy but unstable it's almost like it should be fastened into a bigger seat not be a seat on its own

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars El producto es genial
reviews.reviewText: Quede enamorada de este producto, la calidad es super buena así como de esos colchones de gama, es increíble y muy lindo 10/10 mi bebe de 1 año 3meses entra super bien 👍 super practico ,nada pesado ,lindo ,cómodo, lo tiene todo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good, but not great
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had my eye on a super expensive suitcase that provides a seat for kids, but it was just out of my price range. Came across this and I almost screamed in joy. Now I have mixed feelings about this product. On the one side it’s economical and quick and easy to set up. On the other hand you have to take into account that you’ll have to put this away in the suitcase before getting on the plane (in order to quickly stow your items when you get to your seat). Part of the reason I wanted this was precisely for getting on and off the plane, at least down the gangway. My biggest issue is the chemical smell as soon as you open the package when it arrives, but if you air it out and spray it with febreeze it goes away.All that said, I’ve still taken it with us on the two trips we’ve been on since I got it and have used it every time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not very practical
reviews.reviewText: The suitcase keeps falling down because of the baby's weight on one side so it wasn't actually very practical product in real scenario.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024

reviews.reviewText: I ordered this because whenever we fly, we usually must rush through the airport, especially with connecting flights. It’s easier to strap my kid in instead of having to carry her or have her walk. This works well, but is annoying to install. It’s still something I’d recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great Option for Travelling with Toddlers
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for a recent international trip with my 3 and 1 year old. I've never been one to use strollers through the airport, maybe I should, but I usually don't have the cargo space in my vehicle to also pack a stroller. Now that my 1 year old is a little too heavy to be carrying around in a baby wrap, I wanted a better solution for carrying her around the airport. Her little legs just can't keep up! I wasn't ready to splurge on one of those really expensive carryons that have the built in kids seats. I've always thought those look a little dangerous for toddlers anyways. I'm so happy I found this! It was perfect for strapping to our luggage and rolling her around the airport. I love that There are secure buckles for both attaching the seat to the luggage and latching in my toddler. Once everything was tight she felt pretty secure and looked comfortable. it was also pretty easy to squish down into my carryon when I didn't need it anymore. My only wish is that there was some sort of carrying bag you could roll it up for storage, but not a big deal. Overall highly recommend!
